conbody.p: One you have installed the plugin, you will need to configure Execute Katalon Studio Test task to complete the integration.

li.p: Create and configure a new project in TeamCity. Read more on TeamCityâ€™s instructions to create a new project here.
In TeamCity, select Katalon as Build runner type.

Regarding the Command Arguments, you can enter the arguments directly in the text area or generate them from your in use Katalon Studio.
You need to remove any irrelevant argument such as -runmode. See Command Arguments for more details.
X11 DISPLAY and Xvfb-run configuration: Learn more here. If you are not sure, only change the resolution 1024x768x24 and leave other options as-is.
Now everything is set up and ready to be built.
